display_long_description:
*Galactic Repair requires bHaptics TactGloves, a TactSuit Vest, and a TactVisor for full haptic feedback.

Experience the immersive haptic interaction of bHaptics as you embark on a mission to repair a damaged spaceship in the vastness of space.
You were peacefully traveling through the galaxy with your cat when, suddenly, a swarm of asteroids crashes into your ship, causing serious damage.
 
Now, it’s up to you to fix the broken spaceship with your own hands.
 
Pull out adapters, plug them in, rotate power knobs, and insert energy spheres into power ports — all through intuitive hand interactions that bring your ship’s systems back to life.
bHaptics gear enhances every task with immersive tactile feedback.
Feel cables stretch, dials resist, and electricity jolt through your hands — each sensation delivered with precision.
A wide range of haptic effects makes every interaction feel real — as if you're truly handling physical equipment in space.
Will you be able to repair the ship and survive?
We’re rooting for you. Good luck, astronaut!
